text: Fabiola Andrea Yáñez (born 14 July 1981) is an Argentine journalist and actress who was the First Lady of Argentina from 2019 to 2023. She was the domestic partner of President Alberto Fernández during his presidency. In September 2021, it was announced that Yáñez was ten weeks pregnant. Yáñez and Fernández's son, Francisco Fernández Yáñez, was born on 11 April 2022 at Sanatorio Otamendi, in Buenos Aires. In August 2024, she accused Fernández of domestic violence and harassment during their time as president and first lady; Fernández denied the allegations. He is currently banned by an Argentine court from leaving the country while the investigation is underway. On 14 August, Fernández was indicted on charges of domestic abuse against Yáñez. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Television personalities Category:Argentine journalists Category:Argentine stage actors Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Argentina Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:Writers from Buenos Aires
title: Fabiola Yáñez
